No list was selected for restore
No list was selected for deletion
Failed to save list “%1$s”
Failed to backup list “%1$s”
Failed to restore list “%1$s”
Failed to delete list “%1$s”
%2$d files or folders of the image list “%1$s” could not be found
One file or folder of the image list “%1$s” could not be found
Failed to open Google Play.
The list “%1$s” cannot be added because it contains the current list.
The addition of images was cancelled.
Error while saving the image list “%1$s”
Error while loading the image list “%1$s”
Unexpected error while trying to add a folder.
The addition of images was aborted, as no image list was found.
Your surprise image list is empty. Please press the “+” symbol on top in order to add images or folders to the list.

Here you can select the image folder from which you want to add images to the list.

You can use the filter in order to search for folders.

Press the hook symbol in order to select multiple folders.

Press the folder symbol in order to browse the file system.

Now you can either add the complete image folder to your Surprise Image List, or you can select individual images to add.\n\nNote: you may also use your Gallery app and send images from there to the Surprise Image app.

You can zoom and move the image.

Flip the image to see another one.

Double tap to go to the image list configuration.

Long press for further options.
This is the main configuration page of the app. Here you can either select an image list for editing, or you may configure widgets or notifications.
Please select a name of at least one character.
The name “%1$s” already exists - please choose another one.
On your home screen, there are widgets for the list “%1$s”. Please remember to remove these.
Made backup of the lists %1$s to the folder “%2$s”.
The lists %1$s have been restored.
The lists %1$s have been deleted.
It is not permitted to delete all lists. Please ensure that at least one list is kept.
Made backup of the list %1$s to the folder “%2$s”.
The list %1$s has been restored.
The list %1$s has been deleted.
The folder “%1$s” does not contain any images.
There is no widget available - please place one or more widgets on your home screen.
Thanks for buying the premium add-on! You can now use multiple image lists.
You have to acquire a premium add-on to create more than three image lists.
Please enter a name for the new list.
Please enter a name for the cloned list.
Please enter the new name of the list.
Please select the image list to which you want to switch.
Please select the image list which you want to delete.
Please select the image list which you want to backup.
Please select the image list which you want to restore.
Please select the image list which you want to associate to this widget.
Please select the image list which you want to associate to this notification.
Please select the image list to which you want to add the selected images.
Please select the image list that you want to include in the current list.
Please select after which time period the image in the widget should change.
Please select after which time period the image list should be re-shuffled.
Do you really want to delete the image list “%2$s”?
Do you really want to delete the %1$d selected image lists?
Do you really want to remove %2$s from the list “%1$s”?
You did not select any image for addition. Do you want to add the whole image folder to the list?
You decided to add the whole folder to the list - this will ignore your image selection. Do you want to proceed?
Do you want to add the folder “%1$s” to the image list?
Do you want to add the image list “%1$s” to the list “%2$s” as nested list?
Do you want to overwrite the image list “%1$s” with the backup?
The list “%2$s” exists already. Do you want to overwrite it with the backup?
%1$d of the selected lists exist already. Do you want to overwrite them with the backup?
The list “%2$s” has already a backup. Do you want to overwrite it?
For %1$d of the selected lists, there exist already backups. Do you want to overwrite them?
The following images of the list “%1$s” cannot be loaded.\n\n%2$s
This app needs to have permission on your external storage in order to access the images. Please provide this access - otherwise the app will not work.
